DOC.brief_summary: Apgar score is a subjective measure to assess prognosis and future outcome of a newborn. Pulse oximetry taken at 1, 5 and 10 minutes will be correlated to apgar scores in respective times in an goal to assess the usability of pulse oximetry as an added tool in determining the newborn prognosis
DOC.brief_title: Neonatal Pulse Oximetry Compared With Apgar Scores
DOC.criteria: Newborns delivered vaginaly or by Csection at Kern Medical Center labor and delivery ward known cardiopulmonary disease of the newborn
